company_details.company_name: Map a rash a company ltd

key_business_activities_question.key_business_activities: Rear own beef animals, buy from others and fatten, slaughter and market the beef
key_business_activities_question.key_business_activities_3: Same as above and add dairy products in market line

raw_materials_question.raw_materials: Land, hay, mineral salts, drugs, deworming, acaricides
raw_materials_question.raw_materials_3: In addition, start sourcing from communities, sourcing for high value feeds for faster fattening

new_innovation_question.new_innovation: Invested in water system to grow hay and high nutritional feed, supply water
new_innovation_question._3_new_innovation: Dependent on community dam and rain water

main_competitors_question.main_competitors: Other suppliers, local and regional market

unfair_advantage_question.unfair_advantage: Accessibility to raw materials, trust by farmers and networks. Quality of livestock and market linkage
unfair_advantage_question.unfair_advantage_3: In addition to current, strengthen the relationship with farmers in production of cows with high quality

growth_plan_and_execution_how_question.growth_plan_and_execution_how: Investment in critical resources especially water sources, feeds, infrastructure
growth_plan_and_execution_how_question.growth_plan_and_execution_how_3: In addition to the above, feeding and supplements, sourcing from good local farmers

company_key_position_question.company_key_position: technical directors human_resource production procurement distribution

farmers_benefits_question.farmers_benefits_3: income more_food social_development health assured_market regular_payment

services_to_community_question.services_to_community: Training, link the farmers to technical services
services_to_community_question.services_to_community_3: Creation of model farms and increase more opportunities especially markets

impact_of_services_to_community_question.impact_of_services_to_community: Knowledge, skills, improvements, improved their homesteads, nutrition capacity, built sustainability, reliable supplies of feeds
impact_of_services_to_community_question.impact_of_services_to_community_3: In a addition to the above, link them to dairy markets

investment_for_company_question.investment_for_company_3: equipment_and_machinery land buildings vehicles technology training human_resource

investment_for_farmers_question.investment_for_farmers_3: social_development education assured_market new_market training new_technology

benefits_after_investment_for_farmers_qu.benefits_after_investment_for_farmers_3: In addition to the above, link them to other vital services such as technology

company_impact_on_environment_question.company_impact_on_environment: Assisted community to access water in dams that we have assisted in the construction
company_impact_on_environment_question._3_company_impact_on_environment: Accessibility and preservation of water sources
company_impact_on_environment_question.company_impact_on_environment_3: Biog as production in the community and packaging manure as a source of fertilizer and abbotoeurs as a way of managing the environment

business_risks_impacts_question.business_risks_impacts: Low quality beef, high costs of production
business_risks_impacts_question.business_risks_impacts_3: Low accessibility to markets, low income

contributing_food_security_how_question.contributing_food_security_how_3: More women engagement in dairy (+3000 in dairy production and access to financial services )

food_availability_influenced_by_you_how_.food_availability_influenced_by_you_how_: As above in addition to marketing

factors_for_business_growth_question.factors_for_business_growth: Technology improvement, more financial investment, development of the products further, creating partnerships and networks, improving skills

factors_for_farmers_growth_question.factors_for_farmers_growth: Knowledge on feed production,  management skills, equipment, improved infrastructure
factors_for_farmers_growth_question.factors_for_farmers_growth_3: Same as above in addition to appropriate skills and technologies
